fake_imu_publisher.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 import sys
3 import rospy
4 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
5 
6 
7 if __name__ == "__main__":
8  if len(sys.argv) < 1:
9  rospy.logerr("usage: fake_imu_publisher.py imu_number")
10 
11  i_imu = int(sys.argv[1])
12 
13  rospy.init_node('fake_imu_publisher{}'.format(i_imu))
14  pub = rospy.Publisher('/imu_data{}'.format(i_imu), Imu, queue_size=10)
15  imu_msg = Imu()
16  r = rospy.Rate(100)
17 
18  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
19  imu_msg.header.frame_id = 'imu_link' + str(i_imu)
20  imu_msg.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
21  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.x = 1.0
22  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.y = 1.0
23  imu_msg.linear_acceleration.z = 1.0
24  imu_msg.angular_velocity.x = 1.0
25  imu_msg.angular_velocity.y = 1.0
26  imu_msg.angular_velocity.z = 1.0
27  pub.publish(imu_msg)
28  r.sleep()
